documentation.author: Nielsen, Mishelle
documentation.purpose: Fire a rule upon opening a chart that alerts the clinician that the weight has not been recorded for patients under 18 y.o., or when the allergies have not been for recorded for patients of any age.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_L
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select fld = if (d.seq = 1) "A" elseif (d.seq = 2) "B" elseif (d.seq = 3) "C" elseif (d.seq = 4) "D" elseif (d.seq = 5) "E" elseif (d.seq = 6) "F" elseif (d.seq = 7) "G" elseif (d.seq = 8) "H" elseif (d.seq = 9) "I" elseif (d.seq = 10) "J" elseif (d.seq = 11) "K" elseif (d.seq = 12) "L" elseif (d.seq = 13) "M" elseif (d.seq = 14) "N" elseif (d.seq = 15) "O" elseif (d.seq = 16) "P" elseif (d.seq = 17) "Q" elseif (d.seq = 18) "R" elseif (d.seq = 19) "S" elseif (d.seq = 20) "T" elseif (d.seq = 21) "U" elseif (d.seq = 22) "V" elseif (d.seq = 23) "W" elseif (d.seq = 24) "X" elseif (d.seq = 25) "Y" elseif (d.seq = 26) "Z" elseif (d.seq = 27) "0" elseif (d.seq = 28) "1" elseif (d.seq = 29) "2" elseif (d.seq = 30) "3" elseif (d.seq = 31) "4" elseif (d.seq = 32) "5" elseif (d.seq = 33) "6" elseif (d.seq = 34) "7" elseif (d.seq = 35) "8" elseif (d.seq = 36) "9" elseif (d.seq = 37) "ANY" else "OTHER" ENDIF FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(38))

SELECT IF (PAR1="ANY") SOURCE_STRING = "*ANYTHING", _hidden=0 elseif (PAR1 != "OTHER") SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE CNVTUPPER(n.source_string) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) else SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE cnvtupper(n.source_string)!=" " AND n.source_string NOT BETWEEN "0*" AND "Z*" AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) ENDIF

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

value.value: Patient does not have allergies and weight recorded.
Patient's weight has not been documented.
Patient's allergies have not been documented.
Patient's allergies have not been documented.
